Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style or Grand Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior glazed black; part of elaborate rosette in added white outline with added red dot; exterior completely worn.
Curator's comments: The thickness of the sherd suggest that it may have come from a heavy chalice. Chalice kraters belong to the Mature Animal Style and Grand Styles.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1610) (phase 2)
